attributes.action: Provide an annual statement to all NHS Pension holders
attributes.additional_details: Currently many NHS employees are forced to make retirement decisions without knowledge of their benefits. Online portals providing statements are not available to all staff and in any case are often 18 months in arrears. The current system is unfair and risky. NHS staff deserve to be well informed about their pension benefits and the Department of Health should do more to ensure this happens.
attributes.background:
Provide an annual statement of pension benefits as a matter of course, not only on request. 
Provide all employees with advice and guidance that’s easily accessible and accurate and inform of changes to the scheme.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the Government isn't directly responsible for the issues raised in this petition. Decisions about annual statements and the accessibility of advice and guidance are operational decisions for the NHS Pension Scheme. You may wish to contact them directly about this issue: https://www.nhsbsa.nhs.uk/nhs-pensions
